org.loboevolution.pdfview.font.PDFFont

    • Uses of PDFFont in org.loboevolution.pdfview.font

      Subclasses of PDFFont in org.loboevolution.pdfview.font 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BuiltinFont
      This class represents the 14 built-in fonts.
      class  CIDFontType0
      At the moment this is not fully supported to parse CID based fonts As a hack we try to use a built in font as substitution and use a toUnicode map to translate the characters if available.
      class  CIDFontType2
      a font object derived from a CID font.
      class  NativeFont
      a font object derived from a true type font.
      class  OutlineFont
      Supports width operations for Type1, Type1C, TrueType and Type3 fonts
      class  TTFFont
      A true-type font
      class  Type0Font
      Type 0 fonts are composite fonts with a CMAP to map between source character codes and destination fonts/codes Author Jonathan Kaplan
      class  Type1CFont
      A representation, with parser, of an Adobe Type 1C font.
      class  Type1Font
      A representation, with parser, of an Adobe Type 1 font.
      class  Type3Font
      A Type 3 Font, in which each glyph consists of a sequence of PDF commands.
      Methods in org.loboevolution.pdfview.font that return PDFFont 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PDFFont Type0Font.getDescendantFont(int fontID)
      Get a descendant font of this font by fontId
      static PDFFont PDFFont.getFont(PDFObject obj, HashMap<String,PDFObject> resources)
      get the PDFFont corresponding to the font described in a PDFObject.
